snippet: The funeral was a stunning display of the political alliances that President Hugo Chávez assembled while in power, including some of those with a history of difficult relations with Washington.
abstract: Funeral for Venezuela's Pres Hugo Chavez is stunning display of political alliances that he assembled while in power; thousands of Chavez's supporters wait outside funeral for chance to see his glass-covered coffin.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Simon Romero, María Eugenia Díaz, Jonathan Gilbert and Paula Ramón.

lead_paragraph: The funeral was a stunning display of the political alliances that President Hugo Chávez assembled while in power, including some of those with a history of difficult relations with Washington.

headline.seo: Dignitaries Pay Chávez Tribute, as Venezuelans Express Grief and Misgivings
headline.main: Dignitaries Pay Chávez Tribute, as Venezuelans Express Grief and Misgivings
headline.print_headline: Dignitaries Pay Chávez Tribute, as Venezuelans Express Grief and Misgivings
